description:
Are You An Author Who Doesn't Have Time to Publish Enough Books to Make a Substantial Income?

Want to be a Book Publisher But You Don't Have the Skills to Write in Every Genre?

My name is Charity Cason, and I'm a bestselling author and ghostwriter with years of experience ghostwriting for clients all over the world. I also run my own team of ghostwriters who have worked with my own clients for the last several years.

I get a lot of questions about how to best work with ghostwriters in a way that will help authors get more books out faster, so this course was created to answer those questions!

If you've ever wondered things like:

  • How do I find a ghostwriter?
  • What kinds of things does a ghostwriter do?
  • What kinds of forms do I need to protect myself?
  • What should I expect from my ghostwriter?
  • How much should I pay a ghostwriter?

... then this course is for you!

I answer all of these questions and MORE in this course. When you're finished, you'll know how to find ghostwriters, test them, hire them, work with them, pay them and more.

Click the TAKE THIS COURSE button to get started building your publishing empire!
title: How to Work With Ghostwriters In Your Publishing Business
